title: Popcorn font
content:
Anyone know what font this originated from?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [corn.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140325115859/http:/typophile.com/files/corn.jpg) | 28.38 KB |
author: Veseyjl

comments.content:
if you're trying to recreate this you might try [Happy Fun Ball by](http://web.archive.org/web/20140325115859/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/contributors/chuckdavis/happyfunball.shtml) [Letterhead Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20140325115859/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Letterhead%20Fonts).

but be wary should you choose this font: don't taunt happy fun ball...
